JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities Basic Requirements:A successful software developer will: Have a 4-year college degree in Computer Science / Information Technology (criteria can be relaxed for experienced developers) Have Strong Computer Science fundamentals (OS, Programming, Patterns, Networking) Have a Learning mindset for new technologies like ReactNative/GoLang Have 2-8 years of experience in software development and currently developing software actively Delivered robust solutions that are deployed in products being used by real customersTechnologies in our environment:Here are some of the key technologies that make up our environment. While we do not expect you to have a detailed understanding of each, the more of these you are familiar with, the better. Experience with building apps with ReactNative and/or native code in Android and/or iOS/tvOS and/or PC/Mac and/or Cloud applications Should have strong problem solving and communication skills Proficient in debugging and analysis Experience creating, optimizing, and integrating Application Programming Interface (API) calls.

EDUCATION.PG: MBA/PGDM in Any Specialization, M.Tech in Any Specialization, MCA in Computers, MS/M.Sc(Science) in Any Specialization
